SummaryEnglish: A program that follows a couple who must navigate the exhilarations and humiliations of intimacy, commitment and other things they were hoping to avoid.

1.SummaryEnglish: While recovering from nasty breakups with their exes, Mickey makes a scene at a church and Gus stumbles into a confusing sexual encounter.

2.SummaryEnglish: After Gus steps in to help Mickey out of a jam, the two end up on a bizarre odyssey through the streets of L.A.

3.SummaryEnglish: Gus faces a make-or-break situation at work, while Mickey navigates a dicey new dynamic with her boss.

4.SummaryEnglish: Mix-ups and meltdowns abound when Mickey invites Gus to a party and comes face-to-face with mistakes from her past.

5.SummaryEnglish: As Mickey tries to get her life back on track, Gus takes his date with Bertie to hilarious extremes.

6.SummaryEnglish: A newly confident Gus turns heads on set, while a disturbing day at the radio station leaves Mickey feeling reckless.

7.SummaryEnglish: Gus sets out to dazzle Mickey on their first real date, but the night doesn't go quite as he planned.

8.SummaryEnglish: As Mickey frets over the fallout from their date, a new guest shakes things up at Gus's movie night jam session.

9.SummaryEnglish: Gus gets exciting news at work, but a surprise visit from Mickey sends the day spiraling in a new direction.

10.SummaryEnglish: Troubles keep mounting for Gus as he gets a taste of life in the writers' room. Meanwhile, a new crisis pushes Mickey to the breaking point.

1.SummaryEnglish: After coming clean to Gus, Mickey tries to head home to decompress. But an unexpected turn of events keeps them out together late into the night.

2.SummaryEnglish: While Gus heads to a bar with his guy friends, a restless Mickey stirs up trouble at a dinner party full of couples.

3.SummaryEnglish: Mickey tries to help her work buddy Truman out of a sticky situation, and an on-set accident rattles the "Witchita" cast and crew.

4.SummaryEnglish: A quiet night turns trippy when Mickey convinces Gus, Bertie and Randy to sample her leftover psychedelic mushrooms.

5.SummaryEnglish: On a day of spontaneous adventures, Mickey and Gus open up about their pasts and begin to let go of their fears.

6.SummaryEnglish: Big news on the "Witchita" set leaves Gus caught in the middle of a family dispute over Arya's future. Mickey grows suspicious of Randy's motives.

7.SummaryEnglish: While Mickey schmoozes with her new corporate bosses at a radio station party, Gus strikes up an unlikely friendship with Dr. Greg.

8.SummaryEnglish: Gus joins Mickey for an outing with her dad but soon realizes the father-daughter dynamic is more complicated than she let on.

9.SummaryEnglish: While housesitting at a friend's mansion, Gus and Mickey host a "Witchita" viewing party. But brewing tensions threaten to spoil the fun.

10.SummaryEnglish: As Gus heads off to the set of Arya's action film and Mickey dives into a big project at work, new cracks appear in their relationship.

11.SummaryEnglish: Mickey bonds with her ex, while Gus makes a desperate bid to patch things up with the film director. Bertie has a revelation.

12.SummaryEnglish: With Gus back home, Mickey realizes she needs to make a decision. But her attempt to straighten out her love life only creates more chaos.

1.SummaryEnglish: Randy pressures Mickey, Gus and Bertie into a couples weekend at his cousin's sweet Palm Springs pad. But nothing about the house is as advertised.

2.SummaryEnglish: While Mickey rides a wave of good news at work, Gus tries to spread some cheer around the tense "Witchita" set -- with demoralizing results.

3.SummaryEnglish: Gus helps a stressed-out Arya gear up for a big scene, while Mickey tries to salvage Dr. Greg's disastrous book-signing event.

4.SummaryEnglish: Gus realizes he's facing a major relationship test when Mickey falls sick just as he's heading out on a horror movie location tour with friends.

5.SummaryEnglish: After a disappointing start to her first birthday in America, Bertie winds up on an action-packed LA adventure with a kindred spirit.

6.SummaryEnglish: Gus struggles to keep the actors and crew on task as he starts shooting his movie. Mickey sets out to show an old friend she's changed.

7.SummaryEnglish: When Gus bumps into an ex at a wedding, Mickey realizes there's a lot she still doesn't know about his past.

8.SummaryEnglish: A stunt audition inspires Chris to reconnect with Bertie. Dr. Greg begs for a spot on Stella’s show, and Gus asks Arya for a favor.

9.SummaryEnglish: As Gus prepares for his band's first gig and a trip back home to South Dakota, Mickey wonders if it’s time for her to meet the Cruikshank clan.

10.SummaryEnglish: Back in the land of guns, cornhole and pickle wheels, Gus makes a critical relationship blunder. A plumbing crisis turns awkward for Bertie.

11.SummaryEnglish: Gus scrambles to stop Mickey from skipping town before his parents' party. But the day only yields more embarrassing revelations about his past.

12.SummaryEnglish: As Mickey and Gus think seriously about their future, a spontaneous trip to Catalina Island brings together a motley group of their friends.
